channel.title: No where to add commands**LOOK**
channel.description: I am coding my server,and realized in client.java there's no where to add commands! i added it at the end and got errors,can anyone tell me where to add these? All help appreciated!

item.title: No where to add commands**LOOK**
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

ow dude screw the handler just search for

	public void logout(){
		outStream.createFrame(109);
	}

then under that add this

public void customCommand(String command) {
		actionAmount++;
}

then in case 103 add this…

customCommand(playerCommand);

just do that then you add commands in the void like this

public void customCommand(String command) {
		actionAmount++;
              else if (command.startsWith("item"));
{
				addItem(775,1);
				addItem(4131,1);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: No where to add commands**LOOK**
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“blitz_9100, post:12, topic:154821”]look for this in client.java

case 155: //first Click npc

and under add a if statment like this…

if (NPCID == ####)  {// npc name #### = npcid
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = #; // silk shop # = shop number
}

then save and open shops.cfg

and put this on a new line before

[ENDOFSHOPLIST]
shop = #	shopname				1	1	itemid	amount

1 = sellable and enchangable
2= cant sell or exchange

hope this helps :)[/quote]Thanks,only one who helped.
Also-I don’t go around asking for rep or pming
hai dar give me rep so leik i rep++ nback!

Read full topic

item.title: No where to add commands**LOOK**
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

look for this in client.java

case 155: //first Click npc

and under add a if statment like this…

if (NPCID == ####)  {// npc name #### = npcid
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = #; // silk shop # = shop number
}

then save and open shops.cfg

and put this on a new line before

[ENDOFSHOPLIST]
shop = #	shopname				1	1	itemid	amount

always use a tab to enter in configuration files(NOT SPACE!)
1 = sellable and enchangable
2= cant sell or exchange

hope this helps

Read full topic
